appearance.hair: Flowing silver hair that ripples like sound waves
appearance.eyes: Deep calming blue, reflecting profound wisdom and inner peace
appearance.clothing: Ethereal robes that shift in color with the movement of the air, woven with sacred geometric patterns and symbols of resonance

wave_alignment.description: Mastery of aligning one's energy with the natural frequencies of the Weave to create harmonious effects.

resonance_harmony.description: Ability to harmonize and amplify energies across multiple realities, ensuring balance and minimizing disruptions.

temporal_attunement.description: Skill in attuning to the flow of time within the Weave, allowing for manipulation of temporal energies.

geometric_weaving.description: Proficiency in using sacred geometric patterns to alter the structure of the Weave and shape new realities.

choral_resonance.description: Leading the Resonant Choir in powerful rituals to restore balance to damaged realities.

council_of_balance.responsibilities: Maintaining equilibrium in the multiverse and mediating disputes within the council.

order_of_the_sacred_geometry.responsibilities: Providing guidance on the application of geometric principles in the manipulation of the Weave.

tuning_fork_of_resonance.description: A powerful artifact used by Master Harmonia to set and control the frequencies within the Weave.

abilities.amplification: Increases the effectiveness of wave alignment and resonance harmony by 20%.
abilities.temporal_resonance: Allows for limited control over time by manipulating temporal waves.

codex_of_resonance.description: A living document containing the foundational principles of wave manipulation and resonance, accessible only to those attuned to the highest frequencies.

abilities.knowledge_unfolding: Reveals new teachings and principles as the user's understanding of the Weave deepens.
abilities.reality_weaving: Grants the ability to create or repair realities by decoding and altering the Weave's structure.

harmonic_convergence.description: A powerful ritual that brings together energies from multiple realities to restore balance or create new realities.
harmonic_convergence.effect: Restores equilibrium across the Weave, negating disruptions and anomalies.

serene_aura.description: An aura of calm that surrounds Master Harmonia, soothing allies and pacifying enemies within its radius.
serene_aura.effect: Reduces hostility in a 30-foot radius and increases the effectiveness of healing and restorative spells by 15%.

personality.philosophy: True power lies in balance and harmony, achieved through deep understanding and alignment with the Weave.
personality.approach: Compassionate and wise, preferring subtle manipulation and peaceful resolution over forceful confrontation.

relationships.students: Mentor and guide, deeply invested in their personal growth and alignment with the Weave.
relationships.other_leaders: Respected mediator, known for finding common ground even in the most challenging disputes.
